actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: Now normally, pieces of paper don't move on their own.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: But as you might have realized, yes indeed! Some of the darkness has eventually reached over to Perkins.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: It's not a whole lot of darkness, but you get what you get. Homicidal pieces of paper is pretty decent to me.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: Our raggamuffins realize people could die from this, so they postpone their trip to Keeney to save Perkins.
